text:
Hi,

I hope that bug is a real bug and not a feature but I didn't find anything on that so...

--------------------------------------------------------

# DOESN'T WORK

RewriteEngine On
<Directory /home/wwwroot/mywebsite/www/>
    RewriteRule /this /will_never_work [R=301,L]
</Directory>

--------------------------------------------------------

# WORKS WELL

<Directory /home/wwwroot/mywebsite/www/>
    RewriteEngine On
    RewriteRule /and_this /will_work_properly [R=301,L]
</Directory>

--------------------------------------------------------

Tom

Did you mark it as a regression in BZ intentionally?

I think this is working as designed per the odd per-directory handling in mod_rewrite, and barring some recent regression I don't think it is safe to change.

If it has really regressed release to release for you, please re-open with details.
